description.value:
Trigger Your Strike hits a creature you've designated as your mark and deals damage.

You apply one of the following overwhelms, which lasts until the end of your next turn.

  • Overwhelm The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}.
  • Overwhelm The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed}.
  • Overwhelm The target can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} or benefit from cover.
